sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {
  FaMapMarkerAlt,
  FaCalendarDay,
  FaMale,
  FaPlus,
  FaAngleDown,
} from 'react-icons/fa'
import { CheckboxComponent } from '../../components/checkbox'

import {
  AddButton,
  AddButtonContainer,
  CardBody,
  CardContainer,
  CardForm,
  CardFormInputs,
  CardHeader,
  CardTitle,
  DropdownButton,
  DropdownContainer,
  DropdownItem,
  DropdownItemsContainer,
  DropdownItemsList,
  DropdownItemText,
  DropdownTitle,
  FormInput,
  FormInputContainer,
  FormInputLabel,
  SearchButton,
  SectionSearch,
} from './styles'

export const Home: React.FC = () => {
  const dropdownRef = React.useRef(null)

  const handleClickOutside = (event: { target: any }) => {
    if (dropdownRef.current && !dropdownRef.current.contains(event.target)) {
      setDropdownOpen((open) => !open)
    }
  }

  React.useEffect(() => {
    document.addEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside)

    return () => {
      document.removeEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside)
    }
  }, [])

  return (
    <SectionSearch>
      <CardContainer>
        <CardHeader>
          <CardTitle>Trip</CardTitle>
        </CardHeader>
        <CardBody>
          <CardForm>
            <CardFormInputs>
              <FormInputContainer>
                <FormInput type='text' name='origin' id='origin' />
                <FormInputLabel>City of origin</FormInputLabel>
                <FaMapMarkerAlt size={24} />

                <DropdownContainer ref={dropdownRef}>
                  <DropdownButton onClick={handleDropdownOpen}>
                    <DropdownTitle>Countries</DropdownTitle>
                    <FaAngleDown
                      size={16}
                      color='#FFF'
                      style={{
                        position: 'absolute',
                        right: '36px',
                      }}
                    />
                  </DropdownButton>

                  <DropdownItemsContainer open={dropdownOpen}>
                    <DropdownItemsList>
                      {[
                        ['Paris', 48.856614, 2.352222],
                        ['Paris', 48.856614, 2.352222],
                      ].map((city) => (
                        <DropdownItem key={city[0]}>
                          <DropdownItemText>{city[0]}</DropdownItemText>
                          <CheckboxComponent
                            country={'' + city[0]}
                            handleSelectCountry={handleSelectCountry}
                            handleRemoveCountry={handleRemoveCountry}
                          />
                        </DropdownItem>
                      ))}
                    </DropdownItemsList>
                  </DropdownItemsContainer>
                </DropdownContainer>
              </FormInputContainer>
              <FormInputContainer>
                <FormInput type='text' name='destiny' id='destiny' />
                <FormInputLabel>City of destination</FormInputLabel>
                <FaMapMarkerAlt size={24} />
              </FormInputContainer>
              <FormInputContainer>
                <FormInput type='text' name='trip-date' id='trip-date' />
                <FormInputLabel>Date of the trip</FormInputLabel>
                <FaCalendarDay size={24} />
              </FormInputContainer>
              <FormInputContainer>
                <FormInput type='number' name='passengers' id='passengers' />
                <FormInputLabel>Number of passengers</FormInputLabel>
                <FaMale size={24} />
              </FormInputContainer>
            </CardFormInputs>
            <AddButtonContainer>
              <AddButton>
                <FaPlus size={12} />
                Add intermediate city
              </AddButton>
            </AddButtonContainer>
            <SearchButton>Search</SearchButton>
          </CardForm>
        </CardBody>
      </CardContainer>
    </SectionSearch>
  )
}
